entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then west 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
